content: पुरातन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Old, ancient; <ls>Śi. 12. 60</ls>; <ls>Bg. 4. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Aged, primeval; <ls>R. 11. 85</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 9.</ls> {@--3@} Worn out, decayed. --नः {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} (<ab>pl.</ab>) The ancients. (--नं) An ancient story.
